strapiPost.title: May The Fourth Be With You At Fayetteville's First Thursday
strapiPost.content:
Fayetteville will kick off the first of 2023's First Thursday series on May 4 at the Downtown Square from 5:30-9:00p.

  • Spacing out: First Thursday on the square is an annual event series by Experience Fayetteville intended to gather the community around a combination of music, food, art, and fun! Break out the lightsabers and Jedi capes because May's First Thursday theme is "May the Fourth."
  • Good times: The arts and music celebration will include a diverse lineup of art installations, vendors, food trucks,, a Slow Roll group bike ride with Trailblazers & Bike Fayetteville, and live music from Papa Rap, the C4 Clarinet Squad, and headliner The Irie Lions.

Find all the details for May's First Thursday HERE.
